name: Circle Bash
description:
BAAAAAAAASH!!!!  The new record breaking Hyper Casual Game from Edlix Studios is now out! With over 24 different Chracters to collect and play with. 

Every Week 5 new Characters.

Easy to learn HARD to Master! What's your highscore?

- Over 24 different Characters to unlock

- 5 Different PowerUps

- 5 Different Polygons
